search_strategy: Probabilistic move/swap neighbourhood with cooling schedule
best_for: Small-to-medium bundles needing quick feasible schedules
tuning_notes: Use --sa-iters 2500+ for med42; --compare-preset diversify exposes swap-heavy exploration, while mobilisation preset biases toward distance-aware moves

search_strategy: Adds mobilisation_shake and higher landing penalties
best_for: Scenarios with tight landing caps or long walk thresholds
tuning_notes: Pair with --compare-preset mobilisation plus lower --sa-iters to highlight mobilisation shake vs. default

search_strategy: Deterministic restart loop wrapping greedy local search
best_for: Fine-tuning SA solutions on bounded horizons (<=150 assignments)
tuning_notes: Expose --include-ils with ~400 iterations; set --ils-batch-neighbours 4 when CPU budget allows

best_for: High-mobility cases (synthetic tier) where aggressive diversification helps
tuning_notes: --tabu-iters 2500 plus automatic tenure delivered best synthetic_small runs; capture telemetry for objective trace
